title: Christiane Amanpour | Trump Fires Rex Tillerson: Couple Things
description:
Seth has a couple of things to say about President Trump firing Rex Tillerson.

Christiane Amanpour reflects on how the world will react to President Trump firing Rex Tillerson and getting outside her comfort zone in Sex & Love Around the World.

Then, Amanpour continues the conversation behind the scenes with Late Night producer Henry Melcher.
